ID.description:
SUMIT identifier
Leave empty to create a new entity or search by other fields when applicable

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

Name.description:
Customer full name (or company name)
Required for creating new customer (Leave empty to search by other fields)

CompanyNumber.description:
Customer registered company number (VAT number)
Optional field

ID.description:
SUMIT identifier
Leave empty to create a new entity or search by other fields when applicable

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

Name.description:
Customer full name (or company name)
Required for creating new customer (Leave empty to search by other fields)

CompanyNumber.description:
Customer registered company number (VAT number)
Optional field

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

ID.description:
SUMIT identifier
Leave empty to create a new entity or search by other fields when applicable

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

Property.description:
Property to filter
Supports either property identifier (numeric) or property name

Value.description:
Filter value
Supports array with multiple values as well

PageSize.description:
Returned entities count.
Defaults to 10, minimum of 10, maximum of 1000.

ListTransactions.description:
Include detailed list per transaction
Defaults to false

Deposit_Failed.description: Transactions failed while depositing on Shva

Finished.description: Indication whether the billing process has finished

Transactions.description: Detailed list of transactions (Returned when ListTransactions = true)

UniqueIdentifier.description: Unique transaction identifier, as input during Load

FormatPreservingToken.description:
Format preserving card number
Leave this empty when using CardToken

CardToken.description:
Card token
Leave this empty when using FormatPreservingToken

PaymentsNonFirstCount.description:
Non-first payments count
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsFirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsNonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

AuthNumber.description:
Transaction authorization number
Leave this empty for J4+J5

UniqueIdentifier.description:
Unique transaction identifier.
This parameter can be used for preventing duplicate transactions

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

PaymentsNonFirstCount.description:
Non-first payments count
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsFirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsNonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

Identifier.description:
Transaction identifier.
This parameter will be returned during redirect.

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

RedirectURL.description:
Redirect URL
Leave this empty to use the default RedirectURL

ReferenceNumbers_ByID.description: Sequential list of all reference numbers for the given transaction ids

ReferenceNumbers_ByUniqueIdentifier.description: Sequential list of all reference numbers for the given unique transaction identifiers

IncludeFirstDigits.description:
Indicates whether to fetch the first 2/6 digits of the card number as well.
Defaults to False

CardPattern.description: Card number pattern (including the last 4 digits)

ResultRecord.description: Full result record received from Shva

Amount.description:
Transaction amount
Leave this empty when using ParamJ = CheckDetails

PaymentsNonFirstCount.description:
Non-first payments count
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsFirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsNonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

MultiSupplierNumber.description: Supplier number when using a multi supplier terminal

CardNumber.description:
Full card number
Leave this empty when using FormatPreservingToken/CardToken/SingleUseToken

FormatPreservingToken.description:
Format preserving card number
Leave this empty when using CardNumber/CardToken/SingleUseToken

CardToken.description:
Card token
Leave this empty when using CardNumber/FormatPreservingToken/SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API. (Leave this empty when using CardNumber/FormatPreservingToken/CardToken)

ExpirationMonth.description:
Card expiration month (1-12)
Leave this empty when using SingleUseToken

ExpirationYear.description:
Card expiration year (4 digits)
Leave this empty when using SingleUseToken

Amount.description:
Transaction amount
Leave this empty when using ParamJ = CheckDetails

PaymentsNonFirstCount.description:
Non-first payments count
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsFirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsNonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

Language.description:
Transaction language
Leave this empty to use the company default language

UniqueIdentifier.description:
Unique transaction identifier.
This parameter can be used for preventing duplicate transactions

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

TransactionType.description:
Transaction type. This allows crediting or cancelling existing transaction.
Defaults to Debit

CustomData_1.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

CustomData_2.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

CustomData_3.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

CustomData_4.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

CustomData_5.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

MultiSupplierNumber.description: Supplier number when using a multi supplier terminal

CardToken.description: Card token, this field may be stored on non-pci compliant systems

ExpirationMonth.description: Card expiration month (1-12), this field may be stored on non-pci compliant systems

ExpirationYear.description: Card expiration year (4 digits), this field may be stored on non-pci compliant systems

CitizenID.description: Israel Citizen ID / Passport Number, this field may be stored on non pci-compliant systems

CardPattern.description: Card number pattern (including the last 4 digits)

SingleUseToken.description:
Token for single use. 
This token can be used on the Transaction action, without specifying Expiration, CVV and CitizenID.

GetFormatPreserving.description:
Should tokenize method also return format preserved token, or only Guid token
Defaults to False

ForceFormatPreservingToken.description:
Forced format preserving token
This can be useful when migrating from another credit card gateway to OfficeGuy.
Please note the format preserving token should be a RANDOM identifier, which can't be reverse engineered into the card number (encoding/encrypting etc. isn't supported).

FormatPreservingToken.description:
Format preserved token
Returned when GetFormatPreserving is used

ExternalCode.description: External code returned from the SendDocument API

Username.description:
Letter by click client username.
This value should only be used when using a single SUMIT company for multiple Letter by Click clients.

Password.description:
Letter by click client password.
This value should only be used when using a single SUMIT company for multiple Letter by Click clients.

BackgroundID.description:
Template background ID
This field is supplied by Beeri Defaults to the application settings.

RecipientState.description: Recipient extra info, as specified by Beeri.

PDF.description:
PDF file contents (Base64). Only A4 pages are supported.
Shouldn't be specified when using the SendMultipartDocument API method

SenderAddress.description:
Specify up to 7 lines
Defaults to the application settings.

ReturnAddress.description:
Return address, specify up to 7 lines.
Defaults to the application settings.

Color.description:
Indicates whether to print with Full Color (true) or black-white (false)
Defaults to Black-White (False)

DoubleSided.description:
Indicates whether to print on both page sides (true) or single-sided (false)
Defaults to Single-Sided (False)

MailType.description:
Mail type (Regular, Registered, Delivery Confirmation or Scanned Delivery Confirmation)
Defaults to Regular

LiveMode.description:
Indicated whether this is a live or a test API call.
Defaults to test (False)

AutoRotate.description:
Indicated whether to auto rotate the document to portrait if needed. Please note this incurs performance hit, and should only be used when necessary.
Defaults to False

Username.description:
Letter by click client username.
This value should only be used when using a single SUMIT company for multiple Letter by Click clients.

Password.description:
Letter by click client password.
This value should only be used when using a single SUMIT company for multiple Letter by Click clients.

Program.description:
Upay program
Defaults to the OFFICEGUYNEW10 program (1.5% without payments clearing)

IncludeInactive.description:
Indicates whether to also list inactive payment methods
Defaults to false

InactivePaymentMethods.description:
Inactive payment methods
Please note this list will only be returned when specifying IncludeInactive = true

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Leave empty for false. Relevant for items only.

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default.

DocumentType.description:
Created document type
Leave empty for default

RedirectURL.description:
URL to redirect the user on successful payment.
The following parameters will be added to the URL: OG-CustomerID: Customer identifier OG-PaymentID: Payment identifier OG-ExternalIdentifier: The original ExternalIdentifier When empty, the user will be redirected to the customer payments history page

CancelRedirectURL.description:
URL to redirect the user on cancelled payment.
The following parameters will be added to the URL: OG-ExternalIdentifier: The original ExternalIdentifier When empty, the user will be redirected to the payment page

ExternalIdentifier.description:
External identifier.
This identifier will be appended to the RedirectURL on successful payment.

MaximumPayments.description:
Maximum payments (installments) allowed on the payment page.
By default, the maximum payments count is set according to the purchase pages application settings. Set to 0 to disable payments.

SendUpdateByEmailAddress.description: Email address to which the result document will be created following payments.

ExpirationHours.description:
Number of hours, in which the direct URL will expire.
Defaults to 1 hours. Maximum of 240 hours (10 days).

Header.description:
Payment page header
Defaults to the company name

UpdateOrganizationOnSuccess.description: Send payment notification to organization on successful payment

UpdateOrganizationOnFailure.description: Send payment notification to organization on failed payment

UpdateCustomerOnSuccess.description: Send payment notification to customer on successful payment.

DocumentDescription.description: Document description (the description is printed on the document)

DraftDocument.description:
Create draft document?
Leave empty to use the application setting. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will always be issued as "Draft".

PreventSavingPaymentMethod.description:
Prevents saving the payment method as the default payment method for the customer, following successful payment.
<remarks>
Defaults to False
</remarks>

RedirectURL.description:
Payment page URL.
Redirect your user to this page, in order to continue the payment process.

PaymentMethod.description:
Payment method details
Leave this empty to use the customer payment method, or when using the SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

CreditCardAuthNumber.description: Transaction authorization number, as received from a previous Gateway Transaction

Payments_Count.description:
Payments count
Leave this empty to disable payments

Payments_FirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

Payments_NonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

UpdateCustomerByEmail.description:
Update customer by email (notification email, with invoice/receipt download link)
Leave this empty to disable email sending feature

UpdateCustomerByEmail_AttachDocument.description:
Attach invoice/receipt to email
Defaults to False

UpdateCustomerByEmail_Language.description:
Update email language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentLanguage.description:
Document language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentDescription.description: Document description (the description is printed on the document)

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Defaults to false

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default. Relevant for items only.

AuthoriseOnly.description:
Should the transaction be processed, or only validated.
Leave empty for "False" (Auto-Commit). This field could be used for testing the Charge action easily. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will be issued as "Draft".

DraftDocument.description:
Create draft document?
Leave empty to use the application setting. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will always be issued as "Draft".

PreventDocumentCreation.description:
Prevents document creation following valid payment
By default, all valid payments issue documents (final, or draft according to the DraftDocument parameter). Setting PreventDocumentCreation will prevent the automatic document creation.

DocumentType.description:
Create document type
Leave empty for default

SupportCredit.description:
Allow credit instead of charge (debit), in case the total is less than 0?
Defaults to false

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

SendCopyToOrganization.description:
Send email to the organization as well. Defaults to the accounting application settings.
Relevant when using either UpdateCustomerByEmail or SendDocumentByEmail.

CardTokenNotNeeded.description:
Avoids generating credit card token and saving it on the customer payment method.
Defaults to False

AutoCapture.description:
Should the credit card transaction be captured automatically (J4), or only authorized (J5).
Leave empty for "True" (Auto capture). Please note, when setting AutoCapture to false, "Order" documents will be issued instead of invoices/receipts.

AuthorizeAmount.description: Allows custom authorization amount, other than the specified items.

PreventStandingOrder.description:
Prevents the usage of Standing order recurring chargers, force using debit card merchant number, when multiple merchants are supported.
Defaults to false.

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original (on first fetching), or certified copy.

PaymentID.description:
PaymentID
Returned from the BeginRedirect or the Charge API methods

PaymentMethod.description:
Payment method details
Leave this empty to use the customer payment method, or when using the SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

CreditCardAuthNumber.description: Transaction authorization number, as received from a previous Gateway Transaction

Payments_Count.description:
Payments count
Leave this empty to disable payments

Payments_FirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

Payments_NonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

UpdateCustomerByEmail.description:
Update customer by email (notification email, with invoice/receipt download link)
Leave this empty to disable email sending feature

UpdateCustomerByEmail_AttachDocument.description:
Attach invoice/receipt to email
Defaults to False

UpdateCustomerByEmail_Language.description:
Update email language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentLanguage.description:
Document language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentDescription.description: Document description (the description is printed on the document)

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Defaults to false

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default. Relevant for items only.

AuthoriseOnly.description:
Should the transaction be processed, or only validated.
Leave empty for "False" (Auto-Commit). This field could be used for testing the Charge action easily. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will be issued as "Draft".

DraftDocument.description:
Create draft document?
Leave empty to use the application setting. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will always be issued as "Draft".

DocumentType.description:
Create document type
Leave empty for default

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

SendCopyToOrganization.description:
Send email to the organization as well. Defaults to the accounting application settings.
Relevant when using either UpdateCustomerByEmail or SendDocumentByEmail.

CardTokenNotNeeded.description:
Avoids generating credit card token and saving it on the customer payment method.
Defaults to False

AutoCapture.description:
Should the credit card transaction be captured automatically (J4), or only authorized (J5).
Leave empty for "True" (Auto capture). Please note, when setting AutoCapture to false, "Order" documents will be issued instead of invoices/receipts.

AuthorizeAmount.description: Allows custom authorization amount, other than the specified items.

PaymentMethod.description:
Payment method details
Leave this empty to use the customer payment method, or when using the SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

UpdateCustomerByEmail.description:
Update customer by email
Defaults to False

UpdateCustomerByEmail_AttachDocument.description:
Attach invoice/receipt to email
Defaults to False

AuthoriseOnly.description:
Should the transaction be committed, or authorized only.
Leave empty for "False" (Auto-Commit). This field could be used for testing the Charge action easily. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will be created as "Draft", and recurring items will be created as cancelled.

DocumentType.description:
Created document type
Leave empty for default

SendCopyToOrganization.description:
Send email to the organization as well. Defaults to the accounting application settings.
Relevant when using UpdateCustomerByEmail.

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Leave empty for false. Relevant for items only.

CreditCardPayments_Count.description:
Credit card payments count. Please note this is not the recurrence (how many months the transaction should last), this parameter shouldn't be used on most use cases.
Leave this empty to disable payments and use standard direct debit.

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

DocumentLanguage.description:
Document language
Defaults to the company language

FirstDocumentDescription.description:
First document description. The description is shown in the first payment printed document.
Please note the description will only be shown when the API requests creates a document, and won't be shown on future documents.

PreventStandingOrder.description:
Prevents the usage of Standing order recurring chargers, force using debit card merchant number, when multiple merchants are supported.
Defaults to false.

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original (on first fetching), or certified copy.

IncludeInactive.description:
Also include inactive items
Defaults to false

AutomaticBilling_CreditCard.description: Automatic billing mode for credit card payments

AutomaticBilling_DirectDebit.description: Automatic billing mode for direct debit payments

AutomaticBilling_DocumentsOnly.description: Automatic billing mode for documents only

AutomaticBilling_ProformaInvoices.description: Automatic billing mode for charging existing proforma invoices

AutomaticBilling_PaymentRequests.description: Automatic billing mode for charging existing payment requests

AutomaticBilling_Invoices.description: Automatic billing mode charging existing tax invoices

AutomaticBilling_ChargeDocument.description: Default document type for charges billing

AutomaticBilling_DocumentsOnlyDocument.description: Default document type for documents only billing

Recurrence.description:
Number of pending recurring payments
For instance, for a total of 1 year of monthly payments, specify 12 Setting this to 0 will result in continuous payments. Please note this parameter cannot be used when the LastPaymentDate parameter is set.

LastPaymentDate.description:
Last payment date.
Please note this parameter cannot be used when the Recurrence parameter is set.

UnitPrice.description:
Single unit price in payment currency
Required field.

Total.description:
Total price in payment currency
Optional field

Currency.description:
Payment currency
Leave empty for company default currency

UnitPrice.description: Single unit price in payment currency

Currency.description:
Price currency
Leave empty for company default currency

Date_Start.description:
First payment date
Defaults to the current date. Format should be JSON based (such as 2023-11-30).

Duration_Days.description:
Recurring duration/interval in days
For instance, for monthly payments, specify 0. For weekly payments, specify 7.

Duration_Months.description:
Recurring duration/interval in months
For instance, for monthly payments, specify 1

Recurrence.description:
Number of recurring payments
For instance, for 1 year of monthly payments, specify 12. Setting this to null or 0 will result in continuous payments

UnitPrice.description:
Single unit price in payment currency
Required field.

Total.description:
Total price in payment currency
Optional field

Currency.description:
Payment currency
Leave empty for company default currency

ValidPayment.description: Indicates if the payment is valid

FirstPaymentAmount.description: First credit card installments payment amount

NonFirstPaymentAmount.description: Non first credit card installments payment amount

RecurringCustomerItemIDs.description: Relevant only for payments originating from recurring payments

CreditCard_Number.description:
Credit card full number
Required for credit card

CreditCard_LastDigits.description:
Credit card last 4 digits
Shouldn't be input by API caller

CreditCard_ExpirationMonth.description:
Credit card expiration month (1-2 digits)
Required for credit card

CreditCard_ExpirationYear.description:
Credit card expiration year (4 digits)
Required for credit card

CreditCard_CVV.description:
Credit card CVV/CVV2
Required when CVV is required by credit company

CreditCard_CitizenID.description:
Credit card owner Israel Citizen ID / Passport Number
Required when Citizen ID is required by credit company

CreditCard_CardMask.description:
Credit card mask
Shouldn't be input by API caller

DirectDebit_Bank.description:
Direct debit bank number
For instance, 12 indicates Bank Hapoalim.

PDF.description:
Get PDF instead of HTML
Defaults to False

Get PDF instead of HTML
Defaults to False

IncludeIncomingProperties.description:
Include incoming entity properties
Defaults to False

IncludeFields.description:
Include all entity fields
Defaults to True

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Please note this field is required. Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

HasNextPage.description: Indicator whether the last page has reached

CreateIfMissing.description:
Should the update create the entity if it doesn't exist
This can only be used when Entity.ID is 0 Defaults to false.

RemoveExistingProperties.description:
Should the update entity remove all existing properties, which didn't pass through the Entity.Properties list?
Defaults to false

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

User.description:
Company owner
Leave empty to set calling company owners as owners

Applications.description:
List of applications to be installed on the created company.
Please note installing applications might incur additional charges.

HideFromCompaniesList.description:
Allows hiding the created company from the user companies list
Defaults to False

APIPublicKey.description: Public API Key for future calls

UserPassword.description:
Created user password
Returned only when new user is created

UserEncryptedPassword.description:
Created user encrypted password
Returned only when new user is created

Applications.description:
List of applications to be installed.
Please note this may incur additional charges.

Company.description:
Company details
Only supplied fields will be updated

EmailAddress.description:
Organization email address
This email will be used for communication made by SUMIT to the company.

DocumentsEmailAddress.description:
Documents email address
This email address will be shown on generated documents. Defaults to the company email address.

CompanyType.description:
Organization type
CompanyWithVAT - VATExemptDealer - LicensedDealer - Fellowship - Partnership - CommunityInterestCompany - Cooperative - HouseCommittee - ElectionGroup - Party -

Logo.description:
Logo image file (Base64)
File should be a standard PNG/JPG/GIF file

SkipActivation.description:
Allows skipping email activation before user can login.
Leave empty for false (Require activation)
